name: friend-guard

effect.x-y: All friendly Pokémon take 0.75× as much direct damage from moves while this Pokémon is in battle. This effect stacks if multiple allied Pokémon have it.
effect.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: All friendly Pokémon take 0.75× as much direct damage from moves while this Pokémon is in battle. This effect stacks if multiple allied Pokémon have it.

short_effect: Decreases all direct damage taken by friendly Pokémon to 0.75×.
